level.heading: Boards of Allied Health executive director.
level.text: The Mayor shall appoint an executive director, who shall be a full-time employee of the District, to implement and administer the orders of the Boards of Allied Health in accordance with this chapter and rules and regulations issued pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2(c) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-26, see notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
